title: IPFire Linux Firewall Distro Kicks Off 2024 by Blocking Email Spammers by Default
description:
IPFire 2.27 Core Update 182 is now available for download as the first release in 2024 for this hardened Linux firewall distribution. Here's what's new!

The post IPFire Linux Firewall Distro Kicks Off 2024 by Blocking Email Spammers by Default appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
